article_title: Tipped Minimum Wage Violates International Human Rights Standards

article_metadata.description: I realize that many people don't in fact like the idea of tipping nor even the existence of a different and lower tipped minimum wage. As someone who spent nearly a decade earning a living on it, I do rather fail to see what the problem is but agree, people [...]
article_metadata.author: Tim Worstall
